name: Maestro Bitcoin
description:
Comprehensive Bitcoin blockchain interaction agent via Maestro APIs. Supports 7 API services with 119 endpoints including blockchain indexing, Esplora compatibility, RPC access, event management, market prices, mempool monitoring, and wallet operations. Handles BTC transactions, UTXOs, addresses, blocks, metaprotocols (BRC20, Runes, Inscriptions/Ordinals), webhooks, and real-time data.

Agent skill: https://www.clawhub.ai/Vardominator/maestro-skill
Docs: https://docs.gomaestro.org/
Account and API key creation: https://dashboard.gomaestro.org/
